## Office Hours <i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i>

My office is in 237 Walker Hall. Office hours for Spring 2018 are M-R 1:00 p.m. to 2:00 p.m. Students may click on [book now](https://arnholtat.youcanbook.me/) to schedule an appointment.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
df <- data.frame(Time = c("9:00-12:00", "1:00-1:50", "2:00-2:50", "3:00-3:50", "4:00-4:50", "5:00-5:50", "6:00-6:50", "7:00-7:50", "8:00-8:50"), 
                 Monday = c("Research", "Office", "STT 3531", "STT 3531", "STT 3531", NA, NA, NA, NA), 
                 Tuesday = c("Research", "Office", "Prep", "Prep", "Prep", NA, "STT 5812", "STT 5812", "STT 5812"), 
                 Wednesday = c("Research", "Office", "Prep", "Dept.Meeting", "Prep", "MAT 5500", NA, NA, NA), 
                 Thursday = c("Research", "Office", "Prep", "Prep", "Prep", NA, NA, NA, NA), 
                 Friday = c("Research", "Research", "Research", "Colloquia", "Research", NA, NA, NA, NA))
knitr::kable(df, align = c("c","c","c","c","c","c"))
```

Use the leaflet map below to find Walker Hall. 

```{r, echo = FALSE}
leaflet() %>%
  setView(lng=-81.684954, lat=36.216777, zoom = 16) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng=-81.684954, lat=36.216777, popup="Walker Hall") 
```
